page.title: 19Werneth Low
page.content:
Although Bredbury, Romiley and Woodley are suburbs of Stockport there are farms within the area. However these farms are not 'typical' working farms. Hillside Farm and Hare & Hounds farm on Werneth Low have both responded to the local demand for stabling and grazing horses. Indeed the owner of the Hare & Hounds farm has recently purchased the farm and got rid of the last vestages of 'normal' farming in order to make room for more horses and ponies. The farm buildings and residential areas date from the mid nineteenth century although the area was farmed before that.
Also Werneth Low attracts ramblers and walkers because of its close proximity to suburbia and its natural beauty. It could be described as Bredbury's 'lung'.
